item.description:
This is from Fox Searchlight ... I suggest that if you have tickets, you should still arrive early around 6:30 and hang out and eat some popcorn.

RSVP Reminder
This is a reminder e-mail for the screening of SLUMDOG MILLIONAIRE. Screening details are provided below. Remember, promotional screenings are on a first-come, first-served basis and is not guaranteed seating. We'll see you there!

Bow Tie Cinema City
235 Brainard Rd.
Hartford, CT
7:00 PM Dec, 10 2008
2 Seats

Please print this e-mail and bring it with you to the screening.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby at the tables by 6:30 pm.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Slumdog Millionaire
